mapper.select:
SELECT FEE_CODE , FEE_TYPE , CASE WHEN FEE_TYPE = '1' THEN '수가' WHEN FEE_TYPE = '2' THEN '약가' WHEN FEE_TYPE = '3' THEN '재료' ELSE '수가' END AS FEE_TYPE_NM , START_DT, END_DT, CLASS_NO, KOR_NM, ENG_NM, DIV_TYPE, SURG_YN, CLN_PRICE, HOS_PRICE, DNT_PRICE, PBL_PRICE , MID_PRICE , ORH_PRICE , RLT_VALUE , COPAY_50 , COPAY_80 , COPAY_90 , DUP_YN , CALC_NM , SEC_MAJ , SEC_MIN , SUB_CAT FROM TBL_SUGA_MST A WHERE ACTION_YN = 'Y' AND
( A.FEE_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%' #{findData} '%') OR A.KOR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' #{findData} '%') OR A.ENG_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' #{findData} '%') ) AND A.FEE_TYPE = #{feeType}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_SUGA_MST ( FEE_CODE , FEE_TYPE , START_DT , END_DT , CLASS_NO , KOR_NM, ENG_NM, DIV_TYPE , SURG_YN , CLN_PRICE , HOS_PRICE , DNT_PRICE, PBL_PRICE, MID_PRICE, ORH_PRICE , RLT_VALUE , COPAY_50 , COPAY_80 , COPAY_90 , DUP_YN , CALC_NM , SEC_MAJ , SEC_MIN , SUB_CAT , REG_DTTM , REG_USER , REG_IP , UPD_DTTM , UPD_USER , UPD_IP , JOB_SEQ , ACTION_YN ) VALUES ( #{feeCode} , #{feeType} , #{startDt} , #{endDt} , #{classNo} , #{korNm} , #{engNm} , #{divType} , #{surgYn} , #{clnPrice} , #{hosPrice} , #{dntPrice} , #{pblPrice} , #{midPrice}, #{orhPrice} , #{rltValue} , #{copay50} , #{copay80} , #{copay90} , #{dupYn} , #{calcNm} , #{secMaj} , #{secMin} , #{subCat} , NOW() , #{regUser} , #{regIp} , NOW() , #{updUser} , #{updIp} , (SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(A.JOB_SEQ) IS NOT NULL THEN MAX(A.JOB_SEQ) + 1 ELSE 1 END FROM TBL_SUGA_MST A WHERE A.FEE_CODE = #{feeCode} AND A.FEE_TYPE = #{feeType} AND A.START_DT = #{startDt}), 'Y' )
mapper.select: select DIAG_CODE, START_DT, KOR_DIAG_NAME, ENG_DIAG_NAME, GENDER_TYPE, INFECT_TYPE, DIAG_TYPE, ICD10_CODE, END_DT, MAX_AGE, MIN_AGE, VCODE, DESC_INFO, REG_DTTM, REG_USER, REG_IP, UPD_DTTM, UPD_USER, UPD_IP From TBL_DISE_CODE Where ACTION_YN = 'Y' AND ( DIAG_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%' #{findData} '%') OR KOR_DIAG_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%' #{findData} '%') OR ENG_DIAG_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%' #{findData} '%') )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_DISE_CODE (DIAG_CODE, START_DT, KOR_DIAG_NAME, ENG_DIAG_NAME, GENDER_TYPE, INFECT_TYPE, DIAG_TYPE, ICD10_CODE, END_DT, MAX_AGE, MIN_AGE, VCODE, DESC_INFO, REG_DTTM, REG_USER, REG_IP, UPD_DTTM, UPD_USER, UPD_IP , JOB_SEQ , ACTION_YN ) VALUES ( #{diagCode}, #{startDt}, #{korDiagName} , #{engDiagName}, #{genderType} , #{infectType} , #{diagType} , #{icd10Code} , #{endDt} , #{maxAge}, #{minAge}, #{vcode}, #{descInfo}, NOW(), #{regUser}, #{regIp}, NOW(), #{updUser}, #{updIp} , (SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(A.JOB_SEQ) IS NOT NULL THEN MAX(A.JOB_SEQ) + 1 ELSE 1 END FROM TBL_DISE_CODE A WHERE A.DIAG_CODE = #{diagCode} AND A.START_DT = #{startDt}), 'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT CODE_CD , CODE_NM , START_DT , END_DT , USE_YN , SORT , REG_DTTM , REG_USER , REG_IP , UPD_DTTM , UPD_USER , UPD_IP FROM TBL_CODE_MST WHERE 1=1 AND ACTION_YN = 'Y' AND (CODE_CD LIKE CONCAT('%' #{findData} '%') OR CODE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' #{findData} '%') OR CODE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' #{findData} '%') ) ORDER BY CODE_CD
SELECT 'Y' FROM TBL_CODE_MST WHERE 1=1 AND CODE_CD = #{codeCd} AND ACTION_YN = 'Y'

SELECT B.CODE_CD , B.SUB_CODE , B.CODE_GB , CASE WHEN B.CODE_GB IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT A.SUB_CODE_NM FROM TBL_CODE_DTL A WHERE A.CODE_CD = 'CODE_GB' AND A.SUB_CODE = B.CODE_GB AND A.ACTION_YN = 'Y' LIMIT 1) ELSE '' END AS DTL_CODE_NM ,RTRIM(B.SUB_CODE_NM) AS SUB_CODE_NM ,B.START_DT ,B.END_DT ,B.USE_YN ,B.SORT ,B.PROP_1 ,B.PROP_2 ,B.PROP_3 ,B.PROP_4 ,B.PROP_5 FROM TBL_CODE_DTL B WHERE 1=1 AND B.CODE_CD = #{codeCd} AND B.ACTION_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY B.CODE_GB, B.CODE_CD , B.SUB_CODE

SELECT A.CATE_CODE , A.ORDER_SEQ , A.START_DT , A.END_DT , A.CAL_GUBUN , B.SUB_CODE_NM AS WEVALUE_NM , A.START_INDI , A.END_INDI , A.STD_SCORE , A.WE_VALUE , A.REG_DTTM , A.REG_USER , A.REG_IP , A.UPD_DTTM , A.UPD_USER , A.UPD_IP FROM TBL_WEVALUE_MST A INNER JOIN TBL_CODE_DTL B ON B.CODE_GB = 'Z' AND B.ACTION_YN ='Y' AND B.CODE_CD = 'WVALUE' AND B.SUB_CODE = A.CATE_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND A.ACTION_YN = 'Y' AND ( A.CATE_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%' #{findData} '%') OR A.WEVALUE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' #{findData} '%') ) Order by A.CATE_CODE , A.START_DT , A.ORDER_SEQ

SELECT FEE_CODE , START_DT , KYE_GU , HOS_PRICE, GA_PRICE , BOK_PATH , KOR_NM , STD , UNIT , UPSO , BUN_CD , SUNG_CD , MED_GU , TEJANG_REA , MED_LEVEL , LOW_YN , ETC_MED , OPT_MED_YN , MED_REG_DT , REP_CD , SPC_MED_GU , SALE_DT , IDENTI_MED , CHUNG__STD , COPAY_30 , COPAY_50 , COPAY_80 , COPAY_YN , PRE_FEE_CODE , AFR_FEE_CODE FROM TBL_YAKGA_MST A WHERE A.ACTION_YN = 'Y' AND ( A.FEE_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%' #{findData} '%') OR A.KOR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' #{findData} '%') )

SELECT FEE_CODE , START_DT , FIRST_DT , END_DT , MID_BUNRU , MID_CODE , KOR_NM , STD , UNIT , HOSP_PRICE , COMPANY_NM , JAEJIL , IMP_UPSO , REG_NUMBER , COPAY_50 , COPAY_80 , COPAY_90 , DUP_YN , REMARK FROM TBL_JAERYO_MST A WHERE A.ACTION_YN = 'Y' AND ( A.FEE_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%' #{findData} '%') OR A.KOR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' #{findData} '%') )

select A.HOS_GRD , FN_GET_DTL_CODE('Z', 'HOS_GRD', A.HOS_GRD) AS HOS_GRD_NAME , A.CFORM_NO , A.CFORM_TYPE , FN_GET_DTL_CODE('Z', 'CFORM_NO', A.CFORM_NO) AS CFORM_NAME , A.CFORM_SUB , IFNULL(FN_GET_DTL_CODE('Z', 'CFORM_SUB', A.CFORM_SUB),'') AS CFORM_SUB_NAME , A.CFORM_IO , A.ITEM_NO , A.CODE_NO , A.EDI_FCODE , A.EDI_TCODE , A.START_YM , A.CLAIM_RATE , A.MINOR_RATE , A.REG_DTTM , A.REG_USER , A.REG_IP , A.UPD_DTTM , A.UPD_USER , A.UPD_IP From TBL_CLAIMRATE_MST A Where A.ACTION_YN = 'Y' AND ( A.CFORM_NO LIKE CONCAT('%' #{findData} '%') OR A.CFORM_NO LIKE CONCAT('%' #{findData} '%') OR A.CFORM_NO LIKE CONCAT('%' #{findData} '%') )
